thread.section_title: The Future of Everything: A look ahead from the Wall Street Journal.
thread.title: At WSJ’s Future of Everything Festival, Top Thinkers Reveal What’s Next

author: Leigh Kamping-Carder
title: At WSJ’s Future of Everything Festival, Top Thinkers Reveal What’s Next
text:
A family dairy farm in Japan uses robots to milk and feed its 90 cows. White Castle now sells the plant-based Impossible Burger at locations across the U.S. Toronto turns part of its waterfront into a data-powered neighborhood. What’s next?
The first Future of Everything Festival kicks off Tuesday, with top Wall Street Journal editors and dozens of leading thinkers, makers and doers gathering to discuss that question across fields.
...
